sense.def: Alternative Writing tian diao jing feng 天釣驚風 . Alternative Names jing feng tian diao 驚風天吊 , fright wind hauled-by-heaven; xiao er tian diao 小兒天吊 , children hauled-by-heaven; tian diao jing xian 天 吊驚癇 , hauled-by-heaven fright epilepsy; ke wu tian diao 客忤天吊 , hauled-byheaven following visitor’s hostility; xiao er tian diao 小兒天釣 , children hooked-up by heaven. Pathological Condition of a type of jing feng 驚風 , fright wind, where the patient’s eyes are turned upwards, as if “hauled-by-heaven”. Xiao er yao zheng zhi jue 小兒藥證直訣 5: 琥珀散…治天吊驚風發搐 , “Powder with hu po …cures hauled-by-heaven fright wind with convulsions”.
